Human Resource Officer Job at Pruvia Integrated Limited




        
    

        
        Pruvia Integrated Limited, we are general service merchants with a strong desire to ensure customer satisfaction in the midst of efficient and effective service delivery. As an organization we are driven by the dictum of
‘Impossibility is Nothing’.

PIL was conceived in 2007, as regards to its incorporation and duly registered in 2013 with Corporate Affairs Commission of Nigeria (CAC) with Registration Number RC 1097861. It originated in response to providing world class services and solutions to the society at large and offering an alternative that is satisfactory in areas of our specialty. It has carried out service rendering duties in various states of Nigeria and within the ever bustling business environment of Lagos.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource Officer
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking to hire a HR Officer for our client, A key player in the logistics industry. The ideal candidate will have strong knowledge of HR Officer functions to ensure smooth daily operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Recruitment and Onboarding: Developing job descriptions, advertising positions, managing the application process, conducting interviews, and overseeing the onboarding of new employees.
	Employee Relations: Addressing employee concerns, resolving workplace issues, conducting investigations, and managing disciplinary and termination procedures.
	Policy and Compliance: Developing, implementing, and maintaining HR policies and procedures, ensuring compliance with employment laws and regulations.
	Performance Management: Conducting performance reviews, providing feedback, and implementing performance improvement plans.
	Training and Development: Identifying training needs, organizing training sessions, and supporting employee development.
	Compensation and Benefits: Overseeing payroll and benefits administration, ensuring accuracy and compliance.
	Record Keeping: Maintaining accurate employee records and HR databases.
	Communication and Coordination: Ensuring effective communication and coordination between different departments


Job Requirements


	BSc / HND / BA in Human resource management, Arts or any social science course from a recognize institution
	5+ years of experience in hands-on Human Resources in a structured environment
	Proficiency in HR software
	Knowledge of labor laws and HR processes is also essential.
	Effective HR administration and people management skills.
	Exposure to payroll practices.
	Full understanding of HR functions and best practices.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Strong organizational skills
	Professional HR certification (CIPM, etc.) is a strong advantage
	Strong decision-making and problem-solving skills.
	Attention to detail
	Time management


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 per month. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified applicants should forward their CV’s to pruvia.career@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Business Head Job at Ascentech Services Limited




        
    

        
        Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Head

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: FMCG/Cereal Industry
Reports to: General Manager / Operations Director

Role Overview
     

            
    




	The Business Head will lead the overall strategy, operations, and profitability of the company.
	This role demands strong commercial acumen, leadership, and execution capability to drive business growth across Nigeria and West Africa.


Key Responsibilities


	Drive revenue, profitability, and market share across product lines and regions.
	Lead cross-functional teams (Sales, Marketing, Operations, Supply Chain).
	Develop and execute strategic plans, budgets, and performance targets.
	Build strong customer and partner relationships to expand market presence.
	Oversee day-to-day business operations for efficiency and compliance.
	Foster a performance-driven culture with strong people development.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor`s / Master`s Degree
	10+ years in leadership roles, preferably in FMCG or food/cereal industry.
	Proven P&L management and market expansion experience.
	Strong leadership, communication, and strategic planning skills.
	Proficient in MS Office tools.
	Willingness to travel across Nigeria and West Africa.


Salary
N1,000,000 - N1,300,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resumes to: cv@ascentech.com.ng using the Job Postion as the subject of the email.
